head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths AITKEN, KATHERINE MARGARET

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths AITKEN, KATHERINE MARGARET

block.p: AITKEN-Katherine Margaret. On May 23rd. Beloved wife of the late Kenneth Murdoch Aitken. Devoted mother of Tisch Murdoch Aitken. Your beauty and kindness will live on forever. Friends may all at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave. at 81 Street, Thursday, May 25, 7-9 PM. Funeral Service Friday, May 26, 10 AM, St. Joseph Church, 404 East 87 Street, NYC.
